original: tshor ba gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: tshor ba gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three feelings?

original: bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms rnams so //
analyzed: bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms rnams so //
translated: They are pleasant, unpleasant, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant.

original: gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde //
analyzed: gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde //
translated: The mental faculty is to be abandoned by both.

original: yid mi bde ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba ni mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang gnyis kyis spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: The mental faculty is to be abandoned by both the path of insight and the path of cultivation.

original: dgu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no //
analyzed: dgu ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag yin no //
translated: Nine are to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i skabs yin te /
translated: This is the topic.

original: mig la sogs pa dang / brgyad pa srog dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kho na yin no //🔽lnga po ni /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa dang / brgyad pa srog dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kho na yin no // lnga po ni /
translated: The eye faculty, etc., the eighth life faculty, and the faculty of suffering are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation alone.

original: spang bar bya min yang /
analyzed: spang bar bya min yang /
translated: Five are not to be abandoned.

original: dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang yin la /
analyzed: dad pa la sogs pa lnga ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa yin pa'i phyir bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang yin la /
translated: The five faculties of faith, etc., are not to be abandoned because they are both contaminated and uncontaminated.

original: spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: spang bar bya ba ma yin pa dag kyang ma yin no //
translated: They are to be abandoned by the path of cultivation and they are not to be abandoned.

original: gsum min / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ni zag pa med pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: gsum min / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gsum ni zag pa med pa'i phyir spang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: The three faculties of understanding all, etc. are not objects to be abandoned because they are uncontaminated.

original: nyes pa med pa ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nyes pa med pa ni spang bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is faultless is not suitable to be abandoned.

original: rnam pa'i bye brag bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnam pa'i bye brag bshad zin to //
translated: The specific types of faculties have been explained.

original: da ni rnyed pa dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni rnyed pa dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, the acquisition of faculties will be investigated.

original: khams gang du dang po nyid du dbang po rnam par smin pa du zhig rnyed ce na /🔽'dod par @60a * //
analyzed: khams gang du dang po nyid du dbang po rnam par smin pa du zhig rnyed ce na / 'dod par @60a * //
translated: In what realms are how many faculties that are karmic maturation acquired?

original: dang por rnam smin gnyis /
analyzed: dang por rnam smin gnyis /
translated: In the desire realm, two faculties of karmic maturation🔽are acquired at the beginning.

original: rnyed de / lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po 'o //
analyzed: rnyed de / lus kyi dbang po dang / srog gi dbang po 'o //
translated: The body faculty and the life faculty are acquired at the beginning.

original: de dag kyang /
analyzed: de dag kyang /
translated: Those are not

original: rdzus te skye bas min /
analyzed: rdzus te skye bas min /
translated: acquired by supernormal birth.

original: rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal las skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dag gis rnyed par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang / mngal las skye ba dang / drod gsher las skye ba dag gis rnyed par rig par bya'o //
translated: Since supernormal birth is negated, it should be understood that those two are acquired by birth from eggs, birth from wombs, and birth from warmth and moisture.

original: ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyis dbang po dag ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir yid dang btang snyoms kyis dbang po dag ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why are the mental faculty and the faculty of equanimity not acquired?

original: de gnyis ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tsheg don mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis ni nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tsheg don mi za bar nyon mongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: These two are always accompanied by the two defilements, i.e., ignorance and pride, at the moment of their entry into the womb and their birth.

original: yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na /
analyzed: yang rdzus te skye ba dag gis du zhig 'thob ce na /
translated: How many controlling faculties are possessed by those who are born supernaturally?

original: de yis drug gam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan ma med pa zhig yin na ste /
analyzed: de yis drug gam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan ma med pa zhig yin na ste /
translated: They possess six, if they are sexless.

original: 'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar bskal pa dang po pa rnams lta bu'o //
translated: This refers to those who are born in the first eon, because, at that time, beings were sexless.

original: drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: drug gang zhe na /
translated: What are these six?

original: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang srog gi dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang srog gi dbang po rnams so //
translated: The five sense-faculties of the eye, etc. and the vitality faculty.

original: bdun nam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste /
analyzed: bdun nam zhes bya ba ni gal te mtshan gcig pa zhig yin na ste /
translated: They possess seven, if they have one sex organ.

original: 'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar lha la sogs pa dag na'o //
translated: This refers to those who are born as gods, etc.

original: brgyad ces bya ba ni gal te mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na'o //
analyzed: brgyad ces bya ba ni gal te mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na'o //
translated: They possess eight, if they have two sex organs.

original: ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na /
analyzed: ci rdzus te skye ba yang mtshan gnyis pa yod dam zhe na /
translated: Can those who are born supernaturally have two sex organs?

original: ngan song dag na yod do /
analyzed: ngan song dag na yod do /
translated: Yes, in the unfortunate planes of existence.

original: re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na ni de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: re zhig 'dod pa'i khams na ni de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the case in the realm of desire.

original: 'o na gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams na ji lta bu yin zhe na /
translated: What is the case in the form realm and the formless realm?

original: gzugs na drug go zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzugs na drug go zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Six in the form realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnam zhes bstan la /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa gtso bo yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa rnam zhes bstan la /
translated: The desire realm is called the desire realm because desire is primary there.

original: gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs gtso bo yin pa'i phyir gzugs rnams zhes bstan te /
translated: The form realm is called the form realm because form is primary there.

original: mdo las kyang /
analyzed: mdo las kyang /
translated: A sutra states:

original: gang yang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: gang yang gzugs med pa'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba gang dag gzugs rnams las 'das te zhes gsungs so //
translated: The formless liberations are peaceful.

original: gzugs kyi khams de na ni dang po nyid du dbang po drug rnam par smin pa 'thob ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams de na ni dang po nyid du dbang po drug rnam par smin pa 'thob ste /
translated: In the form realm, one first obtains the six faculties that are karmic maturation.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na rdzus te skye ba mtshan ma med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang dag yin ba de dag nyid do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na rdzus te skye ba mtshan ma med pa dag gis rnyed pa gang dag yin ba de dag nyid do //
translated: Those that are obtained by those who are born supernaturally in the desire realm without sexual intercourse.

original: gong mar gcig / gzugs kyi khams pas ni gzugs med pa'i khams snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang / skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i phyir gong ma ste ;
analyzed: gong mar gcig / gzugs kyi khams pas ni gzugs med pa'i khams snyoms par 'jug pas ring ba'i phyir dang / skye bas ches mchog yin pa'i phyir gong ma ste ;
translated: The formless realm is higher than the form realm because it is more distant and superior in terms of birth.

original: der ni dang po nyid du srog gi dbang po gcig kho na rnam par smin pa thob ste /
analyzed: der ni dang po nyid du srog gi dbang po gcig kho na rnam par smin pa thob ste /
translated: In the formless realm, one first obtains the single faculty of life force alone as its karmic maturation.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: One does not obtain any other.

original: rnyed pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: rnyed pa bshad zin to //
translated: Obtaining has been explained.

original: da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: da ni gtong ba brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now the relinquishment of faculties should be explained.

original: khams gang du 'chi ba na dbang po zhig thams cad kyi tha mar gtong zhe na /
analyzed: khams gang du 'chi ba na dbang po zhig thams cad kyi tha mar gtong zhe na /
translated: When dying in which realm does one relinquish how many faculties?

original: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
translated: When dying in the formless realm,

original: srog dang @60b yid dang btang snyoms nyid //🔽'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad //
analyzed: srog dang @60b yid dang btang snyoms nyid // 'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad //
translated: life force, mind and equanimity🔽cease.

original: gzugs kyi khams su 'chi na phung po de dag dang / mig la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po brgyad 'gag ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su 'chi na phung po de dag dang / mig la sogs pa lnga dang / dbang po brgyad 'gag ste /
translated: When dying in the form realm, those aggregates and the five faculties of the eyes and so on and the eight faculties cease.

original: brdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o //
analyzed: brdzus te skye ba thams cad ni dbang po rnams tshang bar skye zhing 'chi'o //
translated: All those born supernaturally are born and die with complete faculties.

original: 'dod par bcu'am dgu 'am brgyad 'dod pa'i khams su 'chi na mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na ni brgyad po de dag dang / pho dang mo'i dbang po dang dbang po bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro //🔽mtshan gcig pa zhig na ni dgu'o //
analyzed: 'dod par bcu'am dgu 'am brgyad 'dod pa'i khams su 'chi na mtshan gnyis pa zhig yin na ni brgyad po de dag dang / pho dang mo'i dbang po dang dbang po bcu 'gag par 'gyur ro // mtshan gcig pa zhig na ni dgu'o //
translated: If one dies in the realm of desire, if one is hermaphrodite, ten faculties cease, the five beginning with the eye faculty, the five beginning with the faculty of sexual passion.🔽If one is male, nine cease, excluding the female faculty.

original: mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de /
analyzed: mtshan med pa zhig yin na ni brgyad de /
translated: If one is female, nine cease, excluding the male faculty.

original: cig car 'chi ba la ni tshu la de lta bu yin no //
analyzed: cig car 'chi ba la ni tshu la de lta bu yin no //
translated: This is the case if one dies suddenly.

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi /
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi /
translated: If one dies gradually, four cease.

original: rim gyis 'chi na lus dang srog dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dbang po bzhi 'gag ste /
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi na lus dang srog dang yid dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dbang po bzhi 'gag ste /
translated: If one dies gradually, four faculties cease: the body faculty, the life faculty, the mind faculty, and the faculty of equanimity.

original: de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do //
analyzed: de rnams la ni so sor 'gag pa med do //
translated: These four do not cease separately.

original: nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni tshul de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyis 'chi ba la ni tshul de lta bu yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: This is the way it is when one dies with a defiled or neutral mind.

original: gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi ba de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi ba de'i tshe ni /
translated: But when one dies with a wholesome mind,

original: dge ba thams cad dag tu lnga /
analyzed: dge ba thams cad dag tu lnga /
translated: five cease in the wholesome.

original: dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi na thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po rnams dang / lhag par dad pa la sogs pa lnga 'gag ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i sems la gnas te 'chi na thams cad du ji skad bshad pa'i dbang po rnams dang / lhag par dad pa la sogs pa lnga 'gag ste /
translated: When dying while maintaining a virtuous mind, all the faculties explained above cease, and in addition, the five such as faith cease.

original: de rnams ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do //
analyzed: de rnams ni dge ba'i sems la gdon mi za bar yod do //
translated: These definitely exist in a virtuous mind.

original: de ltar na gzugs med pa na ni brgyad 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na gzugs med pa na ni brgyad 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, in the formless realm, eight cease.🔽In the form realm, thirteen cease.

original: gzugs na ni bcu gsum mo zhes rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs na ni bcu gsum mo zhes rgyas par brtsi bar bya'o //
translated: This should be calculated in detail.

original: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: dbang po'i skabs su dbang po'i chos thams cad dpyad par bya ste /
translated: All phenomena of the faculties should be analyzed in the context of the faculties.

original: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang zhig dbang po du dag gis 'thob ce na /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang zhig dbang po du dag gis 'thob ce na /
translated: By how many faculties are the results of the system of training in virtue obtained?

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis ni dbang po dgus 'thob bo //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis ni dbang po dgus 'thob bo //
translated: The last two results are obtained by nine faculties.

original: yang tha ma gang dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang tha ma gang dag yin zhe na /
translated: Which are the last two?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'o //
translated: The results of stream entry and arhat.

original: bar ma gang dag yin zhe na /
analyzed: bar ma gang dag yin zhe na /
translated: Which are the intermediate two?

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o /
translated: The results of once return and nonreturn.

original: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang / yid dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dgus 'thob ste /
analyzed: de la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang / yid dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dag dang dgus 'thob ste /
translated: The result of stream entry is obtained by nine faculties: the five beginning with faith, the faculties of mind, pleasure, and equanimity, and either the faculty of understanding or the faculty of possessing complete knowledge.

original: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni bar chad med pa'i lam la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ni bar chad med pa'i lam la rig par bya'o //
translated: The faculty of complete knowledge should be understood as the uninterrupted path.

original: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: kun shes pa'i dbang po ni rnam par grol ba'i lam la rig par bya'o //
translated: The faculty of possessing complete knowledge should be understood as the path of liberation.

original: gnyis kyang de 'thob ste /🔽go @61a * //
analyzed: gnyis kyang de 'thob ste / go @61a * //
translated: Two obtain it.🔽The faculty of complete knowledge and the faculty of possessing complete knowledge obtain the result of stream entry.

original: rims bzhin du bral ba'i 'thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rims bzhin du bral ba'i 'thob pa 'dren par byed pa dang / rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are, respectively, the inducer and the basis of the obtainment of separation.

original: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig dang dgus 'thob bo //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa nyid ni dad pa la sogs pa dang / kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po ma gtogs pa dag dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig dang dgus 'thob bo //
translated: Arhatship is obtained by nine faculties: the five beginning with faith, the faculty of understanding, the faculty of possessing complete knowledge, and either the faculty of pleasure, mental satisfaction, or equanimity.

original: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //
analyzed: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //
translated: Two are obtained by seven, eight, or nine.

original: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag ni re re zhing dbang po bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob ste /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dag ni re re zhing dbang po bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag gis 'thob ste /
translated: The fruit of once-returner and non-returner are obtained by seven, eight, or nine faculties.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is this?

original: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / btang snyoms dang yid kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
analyzed: re zhig gal te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dad pa la sogs pa lnga dang / btang snyoms dang yid kyi dbang po dang dbang po bdun dag gis 'thob bo //
translated: If the fruit of once-returner is obtained gradually and by the mundane path, it is obtained by seven faculties: the five such as faith, equanimity and the mental faculty.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni des dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste ;
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni des dbang po brgyad dag gis 'thob ste ;
translated: If it is obtained by the supramundane path, it is obtained by eight faculties.

original: brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no //
analyzed: brgyad pa ni kun shes pa'i dbang po yin no //
translated: The eighth is the faculty of understanding all.

original: ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste /
analyzed: ci ste phal cher la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste /
translated: If it is obtained by one who is free from attachment to the realm of desire, it is obtained by nine faculties.

original: gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: gang dag kho nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa kho na yin no //
translated: It is obtained by the same faculties as the fruit of stream-enterer.

original: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste /🔽lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: gal te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthar gyis 'thob la de yang 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po bdun gyis 'thob ste / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: If the fruit of nonreturn is obtained by the mundane path, it is obtained by seven faculties.

original: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po brgyad kyis 'thob ste /🔽de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'thob na ni de dbang po brgyad kyis 'thob ste / de dang 'dra'o //
translated: If it is obtained by the supramundane path, it is obtained by eight faculties.

original: ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste /🔽rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ci ste 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig gis 'thob na ni de dgus 'thob ste / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: If it is obtained by a detached person, it is obtained by nine faculties.

original: 'di ni khyad par yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par yin te /
translated: This is the difference.

original: rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no //
analyzed: rten gyi bye brag las bde ba dang yid bde ba dang btang snyoms kyi dbang po rnams las gang yang rung ba zhig yin no //
translated: The faculty of pleasure, mental pleasure, or equanimity is added to the seven or eight faculties.

original: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di mthar gyis pa zhig yin la /
translated: If the fruit of nonreturn is obtained by the mundane path, it is obtained by seven faculties.

original: rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste /
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsam gtan la 'jug pa de'i tshe yang dbang po brgyad kyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob ste /
translated: When entering the absorptions through the mundane path on the ninth liberated path, one obtains the result of nonreturn by means of eight faculties.

original: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la ni yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa yin no //
analyzed: de la rnam par grol ba'i lam dgu pa la ni yid bde ba'i dbang po brgyad pa yin no //
translated: On the ninth liberated path, the eighth faculty is mental satisfaction.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam la ni rtag tu btang snyoms kyi dbang po kho na ste /
